name: Icarus Six Sixty Six
description: Icarus Six Sixty Six is an intergalactic musical VR experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X equivalent or better Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: VR ONLY - HTC Vive
